docs.title: Welcome to my wesbite.
docs.text: I’m Hannah Peevey, currently pursuing my Master’s in Design for Emergent Futures at the Institute for Advanced Architecture of Catalonia (IAAC). Through the MDEF program, I’m seeking to develop a framework that brings structure to my creative practice and helps me translate imaginative concepts into tangible realities. My background is in Architecture and Design, which has fundamentally reshaped how I perceive and experience the world. Design has expanded my understanding of how our surroundings influence daily life — and how thoughtful creation can reimagine those interactions. I’m driven to challenge the boundaries of sustainable design and explore innovative solutions that enhance everyday experiences through spaces, objects, and systems
